# passURL

**Instance Property**

The URL that opens the pass in the Wallet app.

## Declaration

```swift
var passURL: URL? { get }
```

## Discussion

Use the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/UIKit/UIApplication/openURL(_:)] method to open the pass in the Wallet app.
title: passURL
